title: Ticket #5774: Get all splice connect tests to work on Windows
description: job_dagman_splice_connect-D, job_dagman_splice_connect-E, and job_dagman_splice_connect-F fail on Windows. These tests all expect DAGMan to fail, and somehow that's not working correctly in the test setup on Windows -- it seems that the DAGMan job itself gets evicted and re-queued, instead of correctly exiting with failure.
creator: wenger
